Monster.name: Aptonoth
Monster.description: Docile herbivores that graze in packs. Their meat is considered a delicacy and is rich in nutrients. If one member of the herd is attacked, the rest will flee immediately.

Monster.name: Jagras
Monster.description: Members of the Great Jagras pack, these smaller monsters will flee upon seeing one of their own perish. They're also known for ambushing larger monsters at a moment's notice.

Monster.name: Mernos
Monster.description: Wingdrakes that feast on scatternuts. The flock will travel great distances when startled, making them an invaluable mode of transportation for clever hunters.

Monster.name: Vespoid
Monster.description: Insects that paralyze their targets with their long stingers. They break easily, so attack them with poison or slinger ammo if you want to carve them.

ailments.name: Paralysis
ailments.description: Paralysis renders the hunter or monster immobilized and susceptible to increased damage for the duration. Hunters can unparalyzed if they are hit.

Monster.name: Mosswine
Monster.description: Mosswine are known for their excellent sense of smell, and are often found foraging for fungi. If you're hunting for mushrooms, follow the Mosswine to the motherlode.

Monster.name: Apceros
Monster.description: Herbivores that inhabit the Wildspire Waste. They've developed particularly hard hide to ward off attackers, and are known to gather in groups to defend themselves.

Monster.name: Kestodon
Monster.description: Female Kestodon will alert the pack of danger, while the males will violently charge would-be threats. Their rushing charges can be blocked, however, leaving them open to attacks.

Monster.name: Noios
Monster.description: Wingdrakes that produce a sound similar to screamer pods when startled. Use meat to get their attention, and then hunt them for materials, or use them for transportation.

Monster.name: Gajau
Monster.description: Vicious piscine that form groups to defend their territory from intruders. Be sure not to venture too closely to their habitat!

Monster.name: Kelbi
Monster.description: Small herbivores known for their gentle demeanor and the medicinal properties of their horns. Those wishing to harvest a horn should aim for the head when attacking them.

Monster.name: Raphinos
Monster.description: Wingdrakes inhabiting the Coral Highlands. They group up to steal the eggs of other animals, but this in turn exposes them to the attention of larger, more vicious predators.

Monster.name: Shamos
Monster.description: Small nocturnal monsters. They're particularly vulnerable to Tzitzi-Ya-Ku's blinding flash, but have been known to gang up on enemies.

Monster.name: Girros
Monster.description: Monsters known to attack in packs, using the deadly vapor of the Rotten Vale to their advantage. They're known for crippling targets with paralyzing fangs.

ailments.name: Paralysis
ailments.description: Paralysis renders the hunter or monster immobilized and susceptible to increased damage for the duration. Hunters can unparalyzed if they are hit.

Monster.name: Hornetaur
Monster.description: Small insects that are found primarily on land. They're highly territorial and will attack anything that approaches them. Gather their materials by attacking them with the slinger.

Monster.name: Gastodon
Monster.description: Pack monsters that inhabit the Elder's Recess. They are easily angered by intruders, and will charge at monsters twice their size.

Monster.name: Barnos
Monster.description: Fervid wingdrakes that have flourished under harsh living conditions. They target intruders with a unique acidic agent, and then attack as a swarm.

ailments.name: Defense Down
ailments.description: Some monsters may inflict a status that lowers a hunter's defense. Lasts for a certain period of time but can also be cured with defense-increasing items.

Monster.name: Great Jagras
Monster.description: The pack leader of the Jagras. When hungry, Great Jagras are known to attack monsters even stronger than themselves. It balloons to unbelievable proportions after swallowing prey.

Monster.name: Kulu-Ya-Ku
Monster.description: An odd bird wyvern that has developed limbs capable of carrying weapons. It's been spotted stealing eggs from nests found in the Ancient Forest and Wildspire Waste.

Monster.name: Pukei-Pukei
Monster.description: A bird wyvern known to possess poisonous toxins in its body. It's been spotted storing scatternuts in its mouth or tail, coating them with poison and spitting them out at threats.

ailments.name: Poison
ailments.description: Poison slowly drains the target's health.

items.name: Antidote
items.description: A cure for poison.

items.name: Herbal Medicine
items.description: Removes all traces of poison and restores a slight amount of health.

skills.name: Poison Resistance
skills.description: Grants protection against the effects of poison.

ailments.name: Stun
ailments.description: Stun renders the target inactive, and sometimes causes them to fall over.

Monster.name: Barroth
Monster.description: Barroth seek out ants, their favorite snack, and mark their territory with mud. They attack potential rivals with their devastating charging attack.

ailments.name: Waterblight
ailments.description: Waterblight slows down stamina recovery rate.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

ailments.name: Muddy
ailments.description: A status effect inflicted when mud thrown by a monster covers the Hunter and makes movement more difficult. Slows all actions until the hunter leaves the mud.

Monster.name: Jyuratodus
Monster.description: A large piscine wyvern that inhabits the swamps of the Wildspire Waste. It uses mud to capture prey, and it's known to battle Barroth over territory.

ailments.name: Waterblight
ailments.description: Waterblight slows down stamina recovery rate.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

ailments.name: Muddy
ailments.description: A status effect inflicted when mud thrown by a monster covers the Hunter and makes movement more difficult. Slows all actions until the hunter leaves the mud.

Monster.name: Tobi-Kadachi
Monster.description: A fanged wyvern that flies among the trees of the Ancient Forest. Its penchant to brush against the ground and the trees as it moves around builds up static electricity within its fur.

ailments.name: Thunderblight
ailments.description: Thunderblight increases the chance of being stunned.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

Monster.name: Anjanath
Monster.description: The Anjanath patrols the Ancient Forest, looking for its favorite meal, Aptonoth. This belligerent monster will attack anything without hesitation.

ailments.name: Fireblight
ailments.description: Fireblight causes damage over time, and negates regular health recovery.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

Monster.name: Azure Rathalos
Monster.description: An azure-colored subspecies of Rathalos. More mobile than their standard cousins, they locate prey from the air and quickly swoop in for the kill.

ailments.name: Fireblight
ailments.description: Fireblight causes damage over time, and negates regular health recovery.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

ailments.name: Poison
ailments.description: Poison slowly drains the target's health.

items.name: Antidote
items.description: A cure for poison.

items.name: Herbal Medicine
items.description: Removes all traces of poison and restores a slight amount of health.

skills.name: Poison Resistance
skills.description: Grants protection against the effects of poison.

Monster.name: Bazelgeuse
Monster.description: A nefarious flying wyvern that travels the New World in search of prey. It scatters explosive scales over a wide area to prey on whatever gets caught in the blast.

ailments.name: Blastblight
ailments.description: Blastblight will cause a damaging explosion after a certain amount of time has passed, or upon sustaining a heavy impact.

ailments.name: Fireblight
ailments.description: Fireblight causes damage over time, and negates regular health recovery.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

Monster.name: Behemoth
Monster.description: A powerful beast from another world. Its large horns and muscular frame defy nature. Unique strategies are required to battle it.

ailments.name: Bleeding
ailments.description: Bleeding causes damage when performing certain actions, such as running, dodging, or attacking.

items.name: Well-done Steak
items.description: Provides a moderate boost to your stamina and keeps it at max for a longer period. Meat done right!

items.name: Astera Jerky
items.description: Juicy, dried meat made by Astera's chef. Boosts natural healing and cures bleeding.

items.name: Sushifish Scale
items.description: A scale from a Sushifish. Eat to restore a small amount of health. Also works to treat bleeding.

ailments.name: Fireblight
ailments.description: Fireblight causes damage over time, and negates regular health recovery.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

ailments.name: Thunderblight
ailments.description: Thunderblight increases the chance of being stunned.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

Monster.name: Deviljho
Monster.description: A monster that must feed constantly and will devour anything in its path, even feeding on the largest of monsters with its massive jowls.

ailments.name: Dragonblight
ailments.description: Dragonblight causes your weapon's elemental properties are nullified.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

ailments.name: Defense Down
ailments.description: Some monsters may inflict a status that lowers a hunter's defense. Lasts for a certain period of time but can also be cured with defense-increasing items.

Monster.name: Diablos
Monster.description:
The apex monster of the Wildspire Waste.
A menacing, territorial beast that lurks underground.
Loud noises will cause it to lunge out of the sand in search of prey.

ailments.name: Stun
ailments.description: Stun renders the target inactive, and sometimes causes them to fall over.

Monster.name: Black Diablos
Monster.description: These black-shelled Diablos are actually female Diablos in heat. The color signals their aggressiveness and heightened hostility to other creatures in their habitat.

Monster.name: Dodogama
Monster.description: A monster that devours rock as its primary diet. The Crystals it devours mix with its saliva to produce explosive minerals that it can spit at its enemies.

ailments.name: Blastblight
ailments.description: Blastblight will cause a damaging explosion after a certain amount of time has passed, or upon sustaining a heavy impact.

Monster.name: Great Girros
Monster.description:
A monster that scavenges for meals dropped from the Coral Highlands.
It acts as the alpha leader of a Girros pack, and sports giant fangs that paralyze its prey.

ailments.name: Paralysis
ailments.description: Paralysis renders the hunter or monster immobilized and susceptible to increased damage for the duration. Hunters can unparalyzed if they are hit.

Monster.name: Kirin
Monster.description:
Kirin are so rarely sighted that little is known of their ecology. It's been said they envelop themselves in pure electricity when they are provoked.
The lightning a Kirin cloaks itself with has been confirmed to toughen its skin. The key to hunting a Kirin lies in staggering it, using Elderseal weapons, and protecting yourself from and avoiding its lightning attacks.

ailments.name: Paralysis
ailments.description: Paralysis renders the hunter or monster immobilized and susceptible to increased damage for the duration. Hunters can unparalyzed if they are hit.

ailments.name: Thunderblight
ailments.description: Thunderblight increases the chance of being stunned.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

Monster.name: Kulve Taroth
Monster.description: An Elder Dragon that protects itself with a glittering coat of metal. Its ecology and coat differ with each appearance, thus the need for a thorough investigation. An exhaustive investigation is required in order to break Kulve Taroth's giant gold plated horns. Pursue the monster to learn more about it. Gather tracks and recruit hunters to help you further your investigation.

ailments.name: Fireblight
ailments.description: Fireblight causes damage over time, and negates regular health recovery.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

reward.name: Kulve Taroth Golden Glimstone
reward.partbreak: (Carve Gold Plating, Break Horns, Break Tail)

Monster.name: Kushala Daora
Monster.description: An elder dragon that shields itself with fierce winds, preventing anyone from approaching it. Its skin consists of hard, metallic scales.

ailments.name: Stun
ailments.description: Stun renders the target inactive, and sometimes causes them to fall over.

Monster.name: Lavasioth
Monster.description: Lavasioth utilizes molten lava as armor. They are extremely aggressive and will attack without prejudice until the threat has been eliminated.

ailments.name: Fireblight
ailments.description: Fireblight causes damage over time, and negates regular health recovery.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

Monster.name: Legiana
Monster.description: The apex monster of the Coral Highlands, whose diet primarily consists of Raphinos. It emits a chilling wind from its body, which dulls its prey's ability to escape.

ailments.name: Iceblight
ailments.description: Iceblight causes stamina usage to increase when performing actions.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

Monster.name: Lunastra
Monster.description: A rare female Elder Dragon that litters the air with hot blue dust. Reports of it traveling with her mate, Teostra, are still unconfirmed.

ailments.name: Fireblight
ailments.description: Fireblight causes damage over time, and negates regular health recovery.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

Monster.name: Nergigante
Monster.description: A terrible elder dragon that appears when other elders are in the vicinity. Its penchant for destruction is well documented.

Monster.name: Odogaron
Monster.description: A terrifying monster that scours the Rotten Vale for carrion. Its highly aggressive nature means that anything, be it monster or man, is a potential meal.

ailments.name: Bleeding
ailments.description: Bleeding causes damage when performing certain actions, such as running, dodging, or attacking.

items.name: Well-done Steak
items.description: Provides a moderate boost to your stamina and keeps it at max for a longer period. Meat done right!

items.name: Astera Jerky
items.description: Juicy, dried meat made by Astera's chef. Boosts natural healing and cures bleeding.

items.name: Sushifish Scale
items.description: A scale from a Sushifish. Eat to restore a small amount of health. Also works to treat bleeding.

Monster.name: Paolumu
Monster.description: Paolumu feast on eggs found in the Coral Highlands. They are able to propel through the air using unique sacs in their bodies, and attack with their extremely hard tails.

ailments.name: Wind Pressure
ailments.description: Wind pressure causes the hunter to brace against powerful winds, causing temporarily imobility.

Monster.name: Radobaan
Monster.description: A gigantic brute wyvern that eats the bones of carcasses found in the Rotten Vale, using some of it as armor. It also rolls into a ball as a form of attack and transportation.

ailments.name: Sleep
ailments.description: Sleep renders the hunter or monster inactive and susceptible to increased damage, but only for the first hit, as it will then wake them up.

items.name: Energy Drink
items.description: A Guild-approved beverage that boosts your stamina. Helps shake off sleep, too!

Monster.name: Rathalos
Monster.description: The apex monster of the Ancient Forest, also known as the "King of the Skies". A fierce wyvern that descends upon invaders, attacking with its venomous claws and fiery breath.

ailments.name: Fireblight
ailments.description: Fireblight causes damage over time, and negates regular health recovery.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

ailments.name: Poison
ailments.description: Poison slowly drains the target's health.

items.description: Removes all traces of poison and restores a slight amount of health.

ailments.name: Stun
ailments.description: Stun renders the target inactive, and sometimes causes them to fall over.

Monster.name: Rathian
Monster.description: A wyvern known as the "Queen of the Land." Terrestrial predator, it overpowers its prey with a venomous tail and powerful legs.

ailments.name: Fireblight
ailments.description: Fireblight causes damage over time, and negates regular health recovery.

Monster.name: Pink Rathian
Monster.description: A subspecies with vibrant pink scales. Pink Rathians wield their toxic tails more deftly than normal Rathians, weakening prey with poison before moving in for the kill.

ailments.name: Fireblight
ailments.description: Fireblight causes damage over time, and negates regular health recovery.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

ailments.name: Poison

items.name: Herbal Medicine
items.description: Removes all traces of poison and restores a slight amount of health.

skills.name: Poison Resistance
skills.description: Grants protection against the effects of poison.

Monster.name: Teostra
Monster.description: A brutal elder dragon wreathed in flames that spits blazing fire. Teostra are of such a fierce and deadly nature that the Guild closely monitors their movements.

ailments.name: Blastblight
ailments.description: Blastblight will cause a damaging explosion after a certain amount of time has passed, or upon sustaining a heavy impact.

ailments.name: Fireblight
ailments.description: Fireblight causes damage over time, and negates regular health recovery.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

Monster.name: Tzitzi-Ya-Ku
Monster.description: This odd monster blinds both prey and enemies with a special pulsing organ near its head. It then uses its strong legs to deliver finishing blows.

ailments.name: Stun
ailments.description: Stun renders the target inactive, and sometimes causes them to fall over.

Monster.name: Uragaan
Monster.description: Large Brute Wyverns that feed on ore, using their mighty jaws to crush solid rock to powder. They've been known to confront Lavasioths over territory disputes.

ailments.name: Fireblight
ailments.description: Fireblight causes damage over time, and negates regular health recovery.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

ailments.name: Sleep
ailments.description: Sleep renders the hunter or monster inactive and susceptible to increased damage, but only for the first hit, as it will then wake them up.

items.name: Energy Drink
items.description: A Guild-approved beverage that boosts your stamina. Helps shake off sleep, too!

Monster.name: Vaal Hazak
Monster.description: A grotesque Elder Dragon, that inhabits the deepest part of the Rotten Vale. It uses the fatal vapor of the vale in what appears to be a symbiotic relationship.

ailments.name: Effluvial Buildup
ailments.description: Effluvial buildup causes damage over time, and eventually cuts your maximum health in half if ignored for too long.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

skills.name: Effluvial Expert
skills.description: Nullifies or reduces environmental damage in the Rotten Vale.

skills.name: Effluvia Resistance
skills.description: Gain a resistance to effluvial buildup.

Monster.name: Xeno'jiiva
Monster.description: RESEARCHING. Threat level unknown.

ailments.name: Dragonblight
ailments.description: Dragonblight causes your weapon's elemental properties are nullified.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

ailments.name: Fireblight
ailments.description: Fireblight causes damage over time, and negates regular health recovery.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

Monster.name: Zorah Magdaros
Monster.description: An elder dragon that rises from the earth like a volcano. Where it's headed, and why, the Research Commission has yet to figure out.

ailments.name: Fireblight
ailments.description: Fireblight causes damage over time, and negates regular health recovery.

items.name: Nulberry
items.description: A mysterious berry that cures various blights.

Monster.name: Leshen
Monster.description: Dwelling deep inside the forest, these creatures use their innate magic to control all flora and fauna within their territory.

ailments.name: Bleeding
ailments.description: Bleeding causes damage when performing certain actions, such as running, dodging, or attacking.

items.name: Sushifish Scale
items.description: A scale from a Sushifish. Eat to restore a small amount of health. Also works to treat bleeding.

Monster.name: Ancient Leshen
Monster.description: An old leshen that arrived through a portal to assume control over the Ancient Forest. Sometimes revered as an indigenous deity.
